item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - New Order - True Faith (2023 Digital Master) [24bit/96khz]
item.description:
1. True Faith" is a song by New Order, co-written and co-produced by the band and Stephen Hague. It was the first New Order single since their debut "Ceremony" to be issued in the UK as two separate 12" singles. The second 12" single features two remixes of "True Faith" by Shep Pettibone. Both versions of the 12" (and also the edited 7") include the song "1963". "True Faith" is one of New Order's most popular songs.

Performer: New Order
Album: True Faith (2023 Digital Master)
Published: 1987/2023
Genre: New Wave, Post-Punk, Synth-pop
File Size: 273 Mb

Track listing:
01. True Faith (2023 Digital Master) (5:54)
02. 1963 (2023 Digital Master) (5:35)
